Articles.Content:
I present to you, Spaceship One. My first Multi-purpose Orbital Vehicle; or as I like to call it, "Space-Cruiser". I believe it can reach most of the kerbol system due to it's immense amount of fuel. Fuel can also be it's payload. It can be used to refuel space stations on other places in the kerbol system. I did one mission with this craft wherein it filled up all it's tanks in my kerbin station and then went to the mun to refuel my mun station. Theoretically, you could use it as a space-carrier. It has plenty of docking ports and you may attach landers on them. And I'm telling you, this thing took A LOT to get into orbit. You can also see it's fuel capacity on the screenshots.

In the screenshots, you can also see my Experimental Spaceship. It was my first attempt at making a Space-Cruiser.

Edited April 19, 2013 by Christian365

(disregard)

Edited April 19, 2013 by Christian365
Very nice, I've been working on someting similar, except with more of a thin neck, with ports on the sides. Kind of a tantive 4 look. I like this though.
Very nice, I do quite like the look of them

Any download link?

I'm afraid not. The launcher of the space-cruiser is extremely difficult to fly and I doubt people would even be able to fly it. It took me several attempts before I was able to bring the ship into low kerbin orbit. I also used the kwRocketry mod for the launcher ONLY. But the space-cruiser itself is completely stock.

Nice, will it have an armament?

As of now, I don't have any mods that includes armaments into the game. I only use kwRocketry mainly because of the fairings and additional rocket parts.
